subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Tony Stewart earned his first official Sprint Cup victory as a Nascar team owner, rallying from the rear of the field and making a late fuel gamble to win the Pocono 500.
snippet: Tony Stewart earned his first official Sprint Cup victory as a Nascar team owner, rallying from the rear of the field and making a late fuel gamble to win the Pocono 500.
